clinicInfo.name: Legal Clinic Services
clinicInfo.aboutText: Our legal clinic provides quality legal assistance to those who might otherwise be unable to afford legal services. We are committed to ensuring access to justice for all members of our community.

announcements.title: Holiday Hours
announcements.content: Our clinic will be closed on April 15th for staff training.

announcements.title: New Service Available
announcements.content: We now offer virtual consultations for all clients.
